medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient had 3 episodes of abdominal discomfort over the past couple of months, each lasting for hours and associated with yawning, without any clear association with meals. Severe abdominal pain developed during dinner last night around 9 p.m., accompanied by dizziness when attempting to stand. The patient experienced one episode of non-bloody emesis and presented for further evaluation.
medical_history.past_medical_history: CHF, COPD on 2L home oxygen, DM2, atrial fibrillation not on Coumadin, pacemaker, prior appendectomy, bilateral inguinal hernias, and 'Bright's disease' at age unspecified.
